member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean
member.summary: Called by MSBuild to remove intermediate files that were created by the task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean.#ctor
member.summary: Called by MS build to initialize a new instance of .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean.Execute
member.summary: Called by MSBuild to delete model and mapping files when they were not embedded as resources.
member.returns: true if the method was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean.OutputPath
member.summary: Returns the path from which model and mapping files are deleted.
member.returns: The path from which model and mapping files are deleted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean.ResourceOutputPath
member.summary: Returns the path from which model and mapping files are deleted.
member.returns: The path from which model and mapping files are deleted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityClean.Sources
member.summary: An array of pointers to .edmx files. Each file is passed to MSBuild as a build item.
member.returns: An array of . Each element of the array is a pointer to a .edmx file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy
member.summary: A build task that is used to deploy the Entity Framework artifacts that are generated from .edmx files. These artifacts can be embedded as resources or written to a file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy.#ctor
member.summary: Called by MSBuild to initialize a new instance of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy.EntityDataModelEmbeddedResources
member.summary: Output property that contains the list of all embedded resources.
member.returns: An array of . Each element of the array represents an embedded resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy.Execute
member.summary: Called by MSBuild to embed mapping and modeling files as resources or to write them to a file.
member.returns: true if the method was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy.OutputPath
member.summary: The path to which Entity Framework artifacts are written when they are not embedded as resources.
member.returns: A that represents the path to which Entity Framework artifacts are written when they are not embedded as resources.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploy.Sources
member.summary: An array of pointers to .edmx files. Each file is passed to MSBuild as a build item.
member.returns: An array of . Each element of the array is a pointer to a .edmx file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySetLogicalNames
member.summary: Assigns the correct LogicalName to resources marked for embedding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.summary: Executes the EntityDeploySetLogicalNames task.
member.returns: true if the build task completed successfully; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySetLogicalNames.ResourceOutputPath

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySetLogicalNames.ResourcesToEmbed
member.summary: An array of that contains information about the model and mapping files, including correct LogicalNames, that will be embedded as resources.
member.returns: An array that contains information about the model and mapping files that will be embedded as resources.

member.summary: An array of that contains information about the resources marked for embedding.
member.returns: An array of that contains information about the resources marked for embedding.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySplit
member.summary: Groups .edmx files according to whether the corresponding model and mapping files will be embedded as resources or copied to the output directory.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySplit.Execute
member.summary: Executes the EntityDeploySplit task.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Build.Tasks.EntityDeploySplit.NonEmbeddingItems
